title: 怎样让左手持特定物品的玩家进入特定的队伍？
author: heroberine
txt_content: 如果某玩家左手拿名为加入红队的红色玻璃板，怎样让这个玩家加入红队？（1.12.2和1.14.4都发）

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 xmdhs 于 2020-1-20 12:59 编辑 

/scoreboard players tag @a add red {SelectedItem:{id:"minecraft:stained_glass_pane",Slot:-106b,tag:{display:{Name:"加入红队"}}}}
/scoreboard teams join red @a[tag=red]

team join red @a[nbt={SelectedItem:{id:"minecraft:red_stained_glass_pane",Slot:-106b,tag:{display:{Name:'"text":"加入红队"'}}}}]

replies.author: heroberine
replies.txt_content:
xmdhs 发表于 2020-1-20 12:57
/scoreboard players tag @a add red {SelectedItem:{id:"minecraft:stained_glass_pane",Slot:-106b,tag:{ ...
稍稍改一下就是其他队伍的吗？

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
heroberine 发表于 2020-1-20 13:49
稍稍改一下就是其他队伍的吗？
差不多，只要你明白里面的意思
